item.title: Bug
item.dc:creator: @traitors traitors
item.description:
@traitors wrote:

i run this scipt for like 10 min

[code]program New;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Fighting.scar}
//MADE BY TRAITORS
//Since aryan down i decided to help and get back into scar
//will update it soon when i get back from boarding school

const
chicken=2708595;

procedure setup;
begin
setupsrl
end;

procedure kill;
begin
clickmscolortol(chicken,1,true);
wait(1000+random(500));
OutFight
end;

procedure bob;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
FindMod;
TalkToRand;
FindLamp(‘mining’);
FindScapeRune;
FindCerter;
SetUpDemon;
end;

begin
setup;
repeat
kill;
bob;
until(false)
end.[/code]

i get error

[Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 00651174 in module ‘scar.exe’. Read of address 00000034 in line 2006 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\AntiRandoms.scar

Read full topic
